question: Hurricanes vs. Panthers
description:

question: IEM Dallas: MOUZ vs. The MongolZ
description:
MOUZ and The MongolZ are scheduled to play each other in the semifinals of the 2025 IEM Dallas Tournament on May 24, 2025, at 2:15 PM ET.

This market will resolve to “MOUZ” if MOUZ win against The MongolZ in the semifinals of the 2025 IEM Dallas Tournament.

This market will resolve to “The MongolZ” if The MongolZ win against MOUZ in the semifinals of the 2025 IEM Dallas Tournament.

If the match ends in a tie, is canceled, or delayed beyond June 28, 2025, this market will resolve to 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from the HLTV (https://www.hltv.org/events/8037/iem-dallas-2025).

question: Will the price of Bitcoin be less than $108K on May 25 at 5 PM ET?
description:
This market will resolve according to the final "Close" price of the Binance 1 minute candle for BTC/USDT 25 May '25 17:00 in the ET timezone. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

If the reported value falls exactly between two brackets, then this market will resolve to the higher range bracket.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

events.title: Bitcoin Price - May 25, 5PM ET
events.description:
This market will resolve according to the final "Close" price of the Binance 1 minute candle for BTC/USDT 25 May '25 17:00 in the ET timezone. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

If the reported value falls exactly between two brackets, then this market will resolve to the higher range bracket.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.
